Title: Expands access to telehealth services through insurers
Summary: Expands access to telehealth services through insurers.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-h & 4306-g, Ins L; amd §2805-u, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to expanding access to telehealth services through insurers
